traits.name: Hunter
traits.description: The Mech’s melee attacks become AP and deal +1d6 bonus damage if it is the only actor (allied or enemy) in engagement with the target

traits.name: Provocation
traits.description: When this makes a barrage action you can forgo attacking with a second weapon to gain 2 Style charges.

core_system.name: Style Change
core_system.passive:
Your mech selects one of the following four stances at the beginning of its turn; its effects apply the beginning of your next turn
Trickster: 1/round when an attack against you misses you can move 3 spaces ignoring engagement
Swordmaster: All your Melee weapons gain +1 Threat
Gunslinger: Your Ranged Weapons gain Reliable 1. If a Ranged Weapon already has Reliable increase its Reliable rating by 1.
Royal Guard: When hit by an attack, roll a d6 if it comes up a 6 gain resistance to the damage of the attack.
core_system.effect: Until the end of the combat scene all four of your stances are active at once.

traits.name: Giantkiller
traits.description: The Angelo ignores engagement from actors larger than itself. It can share space with larger actors (even hostile ones) and move through their spaces unimpeded. While the Angelo shares space with a character, it has soft cover from all sources and resistance to all damage from that character.

traits.name: Concentration
traits.description: When your mech takes the Stabilize action in a combat scene, it gains a Style charge.

core_system.name: Dark Slayer
core_system.effect: Until the end of the current scene, when you move or boost you may teleport the same distance. Additionally, when you take the Stabilize action you gain 2 Style charges instead of 1.

traits.name: Exceed
traits.description: When you land with a melee attack you can take 1 heat to gain 1 Style charge

traits.name: Cable Grapple
traits.description: The mech can initiate grapples up to range 5 away. If it successfully grapples its target, the mech is immediately pulled adjacent to its target by the straightest path possible (if it can’t move adjacent to its target, the grapple breaks and it does not move).

integrated.name: Bringer Arm
integrated.effect: On a critical hit, your target is pulled to any free adjacent space to your mech, or as far as possible while still obeying obstructions.
